credits: NoxDraconem for alpha, beta, delta and omega testing.
changes: Streamer name will now be yellow if the streamer is being featured.
Added an option to show/hide offline streamers.
Beam button will now properly be added/removed when the plugin itself is enabled/disabled.
fixes: Fixed an issue with the Beam button not properly toggling off when the popout was closed by clicks outside of the buttons itself.
Fixed update check chache issue which caused the update check to not get correct data on discord restarts.
issues: Beam Button can change position in the toolbar when switching from friends to guilds.
